title: American Horror Story Asylum Season 2 - All Teasers Compilation
author: cecilia gonzalez
comment: Sometimes I wish the seasons were as scary as the teasers but after watching this, I realised that I probably wouldn't be able to survive through a whole season, at least not with my sanity still intact goddamn
The best season out of all and the darkest and creepiest season of AHS. I wish this show was this good as season 2 again.
I'm gonna be honest: I lost my shit laughing at the crowd surfing nun

Asylum is the one season that truly creeped me out. I was so pumped for freak show and the teasers were so good and creepy, but the season really let me down. and coven was clearly geared toward a younger female demographic, and it wasn't too disappointing, but Asylum is by far the best season.
I wish the seasons were actually scary like these promos. They have so much potential to be like this
description:
American Horror Story Asylum teasers compilation
Fx 2011
Rights reserved
